DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : Evaluation - Carriage rate Streptococcus pneumoniae nasopharynx child Secondary Objective : - Carriage rate distribution Streptococcus pneumoniae serotypes - Estimation prevalence rate antibiotic-resistant Streptococcus pneumoniae strain - Distribution Staphylococcus aureus strain - The influence risk factor Streptococcus pneumoniae carriage rate child
DOC.criteria: 1 . Children age 2 month 5 year attend pediatric clinic hospital , day care center kindergarten . 2 . Informed consent obtain parent legal guardian . 1 . Children young 2 month age . 2 . Children follow serious disease : immunological disease , neoplastic disease , renal , cardiac hematological disease , bronchodysplasia , Down 's syndrome .
